headline: Procyclic form-specific upregulation with midgut tissue preference in Trypanosoma brucei
one_paragraph_summary:
This gene shows dramatic stage-specific expression in Trypanosoma brucei, with consistent upregulation ranging from 20 to 347-fold higher in procyclic forms compared to bloodstream forms across multiple independent studies. Expression levels reach exceptionally high percentile rankings (>99th percentile) in procyclic forms, indicating it is among the most abundant transcripts in the insect vector stage.
  • Shows strong tissue specificity within the tsetse fly, with highest expression in the midgut
  • Maintains high expression throughout procyclic cell cycle phases
  • Exhibits modest circadian oscillations under temperature cycling conditions
The consistent procyclic-specific upregulation and midgut preference strongly suggest this gene encodes a protein critical for parasite survival and metabolism during the insect vector stage of the life cycle.

topics.headline: Dramatic procyclic form upregulation across multiple life cycle studies
topics.one_sentence_summary: This gene consistently shows 20-347 fold higher expression in procyclic forms compared to bloodstream forms across seven independent transcriptomic studies, reaching >99th percentile expression rankings in the insect vector stage.

topics.headline: Midgut-specific tissue preference during tsetse fly transmission
topics.one_sentence_summary: The gene shows extremely high expression (>5000 TPM) specifically in tsetse fly midgut across all time points with 10-12 fold reduced expression in proventriculus and salivary glands, indicating critical midgut-specific function.

topics.headline: Cell cycle and circadian regulation in procyclic forms
topics.one_sentence_summary: Expression decreases progressively through the cell cycle from G1 to G2 phase and shows modest circadian oscillations under temperature cycling conditions, while maintaining consistently high abundance.

topics.headline: Upregulation during mRNA decay conditions and differentiation
topics.one_sentence_summary: The gene shows 8-30 fold upregulation in ribosome-depleted conditions and transient upregulation during early differentiation stages, suggesting roles in RNA metabolism and developmental transitions.

topics.headline: Host and tissue adaptation in bloodstream forms
topics.one_sentence_summary: Expression varies significantly between different host environments, with higher levels in human blood compared to rat blood and adipose tissue, indicating potential host-specific regulation.
